name: matt dot sin
description:
follow matt's adventures through the siniverse.

have fun if you want.

testing by ben, as bloody always! am i right?

features:

three short but quite interesting levels i think

many sound effects but no music

playable character(s)

one (1) easter egg

the entire development of this tiny game took 3 weeks and is documented in this mastodon thread. there are many gifs.
